instructions: Go to the Albums tab, then tap Recently Deleted under Other Albums. Tap Select, then choose the photos and videos you want to recover or delete. Choose Recover or Delete at the bottom of the screen.

Open a Burst photo. Tap Select, then swipe through the collection of photos. To save specific photos, tap each photo to select it, then tap Done. Tap Keep Everything to keep the Burst and the photos you selected, or tap Keep Only [ number of ] Favorites to keep only the ones you selected.

Tap the Photos tab. View photos by All Photos or Days, then tap Select. Tap each photo you want to include in the slideshow, then tap the Share button . From the list of options, tap Slideshow. Tap the screen, then tap Options in the bottom right to change the slideshow theme, music, and more.
